org.openscience.cdk.ringsearch.cyclebasis

Class SimpleCycle

  • java.lang.Object
    • org._3pq.jgrapht.graph.AbstractGraph
      • org._3pq.jgrapht.graph.Subgraph
        • org._3pq.jgrapht.graph.UndirectedSubgraph
          • org.openscience.cdk.ringsearch.cyclebasis.SimpleCycle
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, org._3pq.jgrapht.Graph, org._3pq.jgrapht.UndirectedGraph

    @TestClass(value="org.openscience.cdk.ringsearch.cyclebasis.SimpleCycleTest")
public class SimpleCycle
extends org._3pq.jgrapht.graph.UndirectedSubgraph
    A cycle in a graph G is a subgraph in which every vertex has even degree.
    Author:
    Ulrich Bauer
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
    Keywords:
    smallest-set-of-rings, ring search
    Required library to be able to run this class:
    jgrapht-0.5.3.jar
    Required library to be able to compile this class:
    jgrapht-0.5.3.jar
    Belongs to CDK module:
    standard
    Source code:
    HEAD

        public List vertexList()
        Returns a list of the vertices contained in this cycle. The vertices are in the order of a traversal of the cycle.
